wikipedia_page.main: Don Emery (11 June 1920 – 19 November 1993) was a Welsh footballer. He played for Swindon Town, Aberdeen and East Fife, and in the late 1950s managed Highland League club Fraserburgh. In 1969 he was part of a consortium that failed in an attempt to unseat and replace the board of Aberdeen FC.

link_mentions.page: List of Swindon Town F.C. players

response: In 1969, Harris was part of a consortium attempting to take over Aberdeen F.C., along with fellow ex-Aberdeen player Don Emery. The takeover bid was ultimately unsuccessful.
